mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, password, nickname, gender, birthdate, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birthdate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '회원가입', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '회원가입')
mapper.select: select id, member_id, password, nickname, gender, birthdate from member where id = (select max(id) from member)
mapper.update: update member set password=#{updateParam.password}, nickname=#{updateParam.nickname}, gender=#{updateParam.gender}, birthdate=#{updateParam.birthdate}, updated_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_by='개인정보 수정' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, member_id, password, nickname, gender, birthdate from member order by id asc
